summary: Product Size Variants with Individual Prices feature tested successfully. All 8 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend Admin Panel and Shop Page correctly display and handle size variants with different prices.

issues: React hydration warning: nested <a> tags in NavigationMenu - minor, does not affect functionality (carried over from previous iteration)

critical_code_review_comments: Product size variants feature implemented correctly with List[dict] structure for sizes
ShopPage ProductCard correctly calculates and displays price based on selected size variant
Admin ProductManagement has proper UI for adding size variants with individual prices
Price range display in admin table works correctly (e.g., $10.00 - $20.00)
Cart correctly uses variant-specific price when adding products
seed_data_creation: Test products created via API tests with TEST_ prefix - all cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Product size variants feature fully tested: 1) Backend API supports sizes as List[dict] with {name: str, price: float}, 2) Admin Panel Add/Edit Product dialogs have 'Size Variants with Prices' section, 3) Admin Products table shows price range for products with variant pricing, 4) Shop Page ProductCard shows size dropdown with name and price, 5) Price updates dynamically when selecting different sizes, 6) Cart adds products with variant-specific price

backend_api_tests.details: All 8 pytest tests passed: create product with size variants, get product with variants, update product variants, product without variants, mixed variant prices, delete product with variants, get all products, get categories

admin_add_product_dialog.details: Add Product dialog shows 'Size Variants with Prices' section with inputs for size name and price. Can add multiple sizes with different prices.

admin_products_table.details: Products table shows price range (e.g., '$10.00 - $20.00') for products with variant pricing. Shows '3 sizes' badge in Variants column.

shop_page_size_dropdown.details: Size dropdown shows size name and price together (e.g., 'Small $10.00', 'Medium $15.00', 'Large $20.00')

shop_page_price_update.details: Price displayed on product card updates correctly when selecting different sizes: Small=$10.00, Medium=$15.00, Large=$20.00

cart_variant_price.details: Adding product to cart uses the variant-specific price. Toast shows 'TEST_VariantPricing_Product (Medium) added to cart!'
